npc_giovanni_smalltalk01: I will not tolerate your interference.
npc_giovanni_smalltalk02: You cannot stop me...but I’m amused by your attempt.
npc_giovanni_smalltalk03: Your professor has not prepared you for what is to come.
npc_giovanni_smalltalk04: You’ve made it this far. Let me see just how strong you are.
npc_giovanni_smalltalk05: Prepare yourself for a world of pain.
npc_giovanni_smalltalk06: Humble yourself. You are facing the world’s greatest Trainer.
npc_giovanni_smalltalk07: If you insist on disrupting my plans, I will insist on making you regret it.
npc_giovanni_smalltalk08: You have no idea who you are challenging, child.
npc_giovanni_smalltalk09: There is no stopping my plans.
npc_giovanni_smalltalk10: Two things are inevitable: my success and your failure.
npc_giovanni_smalltalk11: You have proven yourself by reaching me, so I shall spare you a moment of my time.
npc_giovanni_smalltalk12: You may have made it here, but this is as far as you’ll go.
npc_giovanni_smalltalk13: I’d say to prepare for battle, but you have already lost.
npc_giovanni_greeting01: I must say—I am impressed you got here.
npc_giovanni_greeting02: I am the leader of this enterprise...Giovanni!
npc_giovanni_greeting04: How dare you?! You will pay for your insolence!
npc_giovanni_greeting05: I commend you for standing up to me, Trainer. I trust you’ll make this worth my time.
npc_giovanni_greeting06: You are foolish to confront me, but I’m impressed by your confidence. Let’s battle.
npc_giovanni_greeting07: My goal is beyond your comprehension.
npc_giovanni_greeting08: If you insist on confronting me, you will pay the price!
npc_giovanni_greeting09: What’s this now? I hope you are a worthy opponent.
npc_giovanni_defeat02: Your love of Pokémon gave you the advantage...this time.
npc_giovanni_defeat04: This isn’t over. We will meet on the battlefield again.
npc_giovanni_goodbye02: You cannot stop my master plan.
npc_giovanni_goodbye03: Do not try to interfere again.
npc_giovanni_goodbye04: You failed as soon as you challenged me, Trainer.
npc_giovanni_goodbye05: As expected. Run back to your professor—you still have much training to do.
